quickPlot

quickPlot uses S4 classes. "Dot" classes are not exported and are therefore intended for internal use only.

Plotting classes - used within <code>Plot</code>

New classes
.arrangement
The layout or "arrangement" of plot objects
.quickPlot
Main class for Plot - contains .quickGrob and .arrangement objects
.quickPlotGrob
GRaphical OBject used by quickPlot - smallest unit
Unions of existing classes:
.quickPlottables
The union of all object classes Plot can accept
.quickPlotObjects
The union of spatialObjects and several others
spatialObjects
The union of several spatial classes

See also
